column5: Can any body help me out by letting me know where in the Peterborough area is the best spot to take a motor to have about a 4" piece of the cavitation plate repaired?  I don't have any of the pieces that broke off and about half of the trim tab is exposed now.
Paris Marine just south of Lakefield may be able to help you and if not, they could probably suggest someone who can.  http://www.parismarine.ca/
